column1: Is it undeniably fair to call the Vietnam War "The War of American Aggression"?
Was Nikita Khrushchev fully justified in placing missiles in Cuba in 1962 to deter blatant US aggression and invasion threats?
Was the US invasion of Iraq blatantly unjustified given the discredited WMD claims?
Was the bombing of Hiroshima & Nagasaki with nuclear weapons a morally indefensible and unnecessary decision to bring about the end of WW2?
Was the US invasion of Grenada in 1983 an egregiously unjustified overreach and a blatant violation of international law?
Is it unquestionably fair to call the 1989 invasion of Panama a flagrant lawless act of US aggression?
Was the USAAF 1945 bombing of Dresden egregiously unjustified given its limited capacity for military industry?
